Installation
============

To install the ``profitroll`` package :

- Clone the following git https://github.com/Pablitorichard/PROFITROLL-Master on your device with the command:

.. code-block::

    $ git clone https://github.com/Pablitorichard/PROFITROLL-Master

- Go into a terminal in the created, where the setup.py file is
- Run the following command :

.. code-block::

    $ python setup.py install

- Enjoy ``profitroll``
- You can have a look to the notebook in the demo folder
